reviewText:
Took a bit of a gamble on this, but it's not bad.  If you are picky about video transfer quality, this probably would irritate you.  If you just enjoy watching great scenery and seeing many familiar faces, it's worth getting.  I have the Due South series but that was the only repeat for me.
My favorite of the other movies is Rugged Gold, a story that reminds me of Silence of the North that starred Tom Skerritt & Ellen Burstyn.  The other movies are very watchable with actors including Graham Greene, William Smith (as a bad guy of course!), Dan Haggerty, Mickey Rooney, Bo Hopkins and more.
